actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the President should extend full diplomatic recognition to the African National Congress in South Africa and should provide it with economic support in its struggle against apartheid.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should recognize the African National Congress as the legitimate representative of black South Africans and that he should support them in their struggle against apartheid.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the President should extend full diplomatic recognition to the African National Congress in South Africa and should provide it with economic support in its struggle against apartheid.
